about_the_game:
Pharmacy Simulator offers you a realistic experience of pharmacy management and operation. Set up your shop, decorate it as you wish, and enhance it. Purchase over a hundred types of medications and hundreds of related products, set prices, and make sales. Manage your finances realistically to increase your earnings and meet the needs of your pharmacy. Increase your potential customer base by upgrading your business permits. Pharmacy Simulator provides you with an incredibly authentic pharmacy experience. Prove your skills in a challenging economic system.

ECONOMIC MANAGEMENT

Balance income and expenses.

  • Use bank loans to meet your needs, but don't forget to repay them on time.

  • Pay your taxes and be a good citizen.

  • Set product prices according to the market. Be careful not to exceed the government's prescribed profit-loss ratio.

  • Don't forget to pay your bills to avoid being left in the dark.
    Increase your score and rise in the pharmacists' association by managing your economy well.

DECORATION

  • Decorate your store as you wish.

  • A stylish decor will increase your potential customer base and boost your earnings.

  • Expand your store to increase your product and customer base.

PRESCRIPTION SYSTEM

  • Increase your level and unlock prescription locks. Purchase high-prescription medications.

  • Selling high-prescription medications will increase your potential customer base.


PRODUCTS

    medications

  • Purchase over a hundred types of medications.

  • Purchase multiple types of medications for each illness. Help patients and increase your score.

    related Products

  • Purchase all the necessary products for a pharmacy and sell them.

  • Categorize products correctly to make customers' jobs easier.

Purchase over a hundred types of medications and hundreds of related products, set prices, and make sales. Manage your finances realistically to increase your earnings and meet the needs of your pharmacy. Increase your potential customer base by upgrading your business permits. name: Pharmacy Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 -64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core İ3- 6th Gen.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX750-Ti 2GB / AMD RX470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 -64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660Tİ 6GB / RX580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience a realistic pharmacy management experience with Pharmacy Simulator. Set up your shop, decorate it as you wish, and purchase over a hundred types of medications. Pharmacy Simulator offers you an incredibly realistic pharmacy experience. Prove your skills in a challenging economic system.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Swedish
